name: Over the Fire Scalloped Potatoes
author: Rebecca Gould
summary: I make these great hands on potatoes  beforehand, when everything is going to be cooked on the grill.  They're also great for a campfire on a small grill. These potatoes will keep everyone coming back for more! Have recipe in hand!
ingredients: 8 large baking potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (10 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
½ cup crumbled crisply cooked bacon  (Optional)
directions: Preheat a grill for medium heat
Prepare 8 pieces of aluminum foil with vegetable cooking spray
Combine potatoes, green onion, soup, cheese, (and bacon and mushrooms if using) in a bowl
Season to taste with salt and pepper
Evenly divide the potato mixture among the squares of aluminum foil
Fold into foil packets, sealing well
Cook foil packets on the grill for 12 to 20 minutes, until the potatoes have cooked
